// Auth utilities
export const getCurrentUser=()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const user=localStorage.getItem('user');if(token&&user){return JSON.parse(user);}return null;};export const logout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');localStorage.removeItem('user');window.location.href='/';};export const isAuthenticated=()=>{return!!localStorage.getItem('token');};
